  proposition: Research paper by Luccioni et al. examines power consumption and cost of AI deployment.

  proposition: Zhou et al. proposed LIMA: Less is More for Alignment approach.
    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: Hubinger et al. studied risks from learned optimization in advanced machine learning systems.

    Hubinger et al.|FOCUSES_ON|advanced machine learning systems

    (no explicit relationships)

    Turner et al.|EXPLORES|optimal policies
